However, he also expressed feelings of stress and anxiety at times, suggesting he might not always feel confident in his problem-solving abilities. Given his reflections on the difficulties and the emotional toll, it seems he leans towards feeling less capable in complex problem-solving situations.

He seems more focused on resilience and seeking support rather than natural aptitude in logical analysis.
